alert.note: Alert for Iberville; West Baton Rouge (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 02 at 4:58PM CDT until August 02 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WEST BATON ROUGE AND SOUTHEASTERN IBERVILLE PARISHES... At 457 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Plaquemine, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Plaquemine, Port Allen, St. Gabriel, Addis, Brusly and Bayou Sorrel. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana near mile marker 154. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in New Orleans.
